# owlly-sign

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description                                                                                                      | Type                 | Default       |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- | ------------- |
| `ariaLabel`          | `aria-label`           | An aria-label for the shadowed button. Per default "sign" translated in de, fr, it or en according browser lang. | `string`             | `undefined`   |
| `observerRootMargin` | `observer-root-margin` | IntersectionObserver rootMargin property.                                                                        | `string`             | `'100px 0px'` |
| `observerThreshold`  | `observer-threshold`   | IntersectionObserver threshold property.                                                                         | `number \| number[]` | `undefined`   |

## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                                                            |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | A custom text to be displayed in the button. Per default "sign" translated in de, fr, it or en according browser lang. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                          | Description                          |
| --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `--owlly-signature-button-background`         | Button background @default #fdc600   |
| `--owlly-signature-button-border-radius`      | Button border radius @default 8px    |
| `--owlly-signature-button-color`              | Button color @default black          |
| `--owlly-signature-button-font-size`          | Button font size @default 1em        |
| `--owlly-signature-button-font-weight`        | Button font weight @default 700      |
| `--owlly-signature-button-google-font-family` | Button font family. @default inherit |
| `--owlly-signature-button-height`             | Button height @default 40px          |
| `--owlly-signature-button-line-height`        | Button line height                   |
| `--owlly-signature-button-margin`             | Button margin @default 16px 0        |
| `--owlly-signature-button-padding`            | Button padding @default 8px 12px     |
| `--owlly-signature-button-width`              | Button width @default inherit        |
